title: Minecraft Java版 19w11a 发布
author: 匿名
txt_content:
本帖最后由 匿名 于 2019-3-15 16:31 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.14 仍未发布，19w11a 为其第 25 个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



It's wednesday, my dudes! Todays snapshot marks The Village & Pillage update as, for the most part, feature complete. We're still planning to do a big polish pass, there may be some small features snuck in here or there, but ultimately it's bug fixing from here on out and we're hoping for a release quite soon!  
周三了，伙计！今天的快照标志着村庄与掠夺更新绝大多数的特性已经完成。我们仍在计划着一些优化，可能或这儿或那儿会藏一些小特性，但最主要的还是些漏洞修复。我们希望着能够尽快正式发布！

CHANGES IN 19W11A
19W11A 的改动

Lots of accessibility improvements!
Added a new "Globe" banner pattern and item (Currently only accessible from commands or the creative inventory)
Trading changes
Added recipe for smithing and fletching table
 TNT and TNT minecart explosions now have 100% drop rate大量无障碍功能改进！
添加新的「地球」旗帜图案和物品（目前只能通过命令或创造模式物品栏获得）
交易改动
添加合成制箭台和锻造台的配方
TNT 和 TNT 矿车现在爆炸有 100% 的掉落率

ACCESSIBILITY
无障碍

There's a new Accessibility menu which provides a useful place for all of our accessibility features to be toggled
When the narrator is turned on, buttons will be narrated on focus
Most screens allow tab and shift+tab navigation through buttons, edit boxes and other UI elements
Most lists allow up/down arrow keys to navigate through them
We've added a new option for turning up the background of all transparent text elements, which should help make them more readable for some people添加了新的「无障碍」菜单，提供了切换这些无障碍特性的功能，
当复述功能打开时，有焦点的按钮会被复述。
可以在绝大部分界面内按 tab 与 shift+tab 在按钮间切换、编辑滑块及其他界面元素
可以在绝大多数列表中按按上/下箭头滚动
添加了为所有透明背景的文字显示背景的选项，应该会帮助一些人更好地阅读文字

SMITHING TABLE AND FLETCHING TABLE
锻造台与制箭台

Smithing table is crafted with 4 planks + 2 iron ingots
Fletching table is crafted with 4 planks + 2 flint
Villagers use them as a work site
We've decided not to add the functionality for these blocks for this update as we want to make sure that they're useful for the overall gameplay. We have a great idea for them for the next major themed update...锻造台用 4 个木板和 2 个铁锭合成
制箭台用 4 个木板和 2 个燧石合成
村民把它们作为工作站
我们决定不在本次更新中为它们添加功能，这是为了让它们能够对整体游戏体验有帮助。目前已经有了很棒的想法了，会在下一次大主题更新中实施…

TRADING CHANGES
交易改动

Lots of new trades have been added
Villagers now level up in a new way
The trading UI is updated (WIP)
The trading prices now depend on your reputation and on demand
The villagers will restock up to two times per day (if they can work at their work station!)
Added visual trading; villagers will display the item they want to trade for your in-hand item添加了大量的新交易
村民现在会以新的方式升级了
更新交易界面（仍在改进 work in progress）
现在交易的价格会根据你的声誉和需求改变
村民每天会补货两次（如果他们能在工作站工作的话！）
添加了视觉交易；村民会显示出他们想要的用来卖给你你手中拿着的物品的物品。

VILLAGER CHANGES
村民改动

Villagers now have a daily schedule. They will for example go to work and meet up at the village bell
Each villager will try to find their own bed and work station
Each profession has a specific block that works as a work station for them (e.g. lectern for the librarian and cauldron for the leatherworker)
Village detection is now based on beds, job sites and meeting points instead of doors
Iron golems will spawn when enough villagers meet村民现在有日程表了。他们可能会去工作，或是去村庄的钟处会面
每个村民都会尝试找到他自己的床和工作站
每个职业的村民都有一个特定的用来当工作站的方块（例如，图书管理员的是讲台，皮革工匠的是炼药锅）
村庄探测现在基于床、工作站和碰面点，而不是门了
铁傀儡会在足够的村民会面以后生成

FIXED BUGS IN 19W11A
19W11A 中修复的漏洞

MC-112 - Blocks/entities above beds push players out of bed
修复：床上的方块/实体把玩家挤出床
MC-926 - When sleeping on a bed, particle effects are slanted or don't appear at all
修复：当在床上睡觉时，粒子效果倾斜或压根不显示
MC-2376 - Wolves shaking fur dry while dying
修复：狼在死的时候会甩干毛
MC-13497 - Wither skeletons and zombie pigmen won't go through lava to get to enemies, even though they can't burn
修复：尽管不会受伤，凋灵骷髅和僵尸猪人不会跨过熔岩追敌人
MC-30845 - Camera is glitching through tall grass, sea grass, and kelp in F5 (third-person) mode
修复：F5（第三人称）下，摄像机在高草、海草和海带中表现有故障
MC-44471 - Difficulty lock appears to be unlocked if switching dimensions
修复：切换维度后，难度锁定显示为未锁定
MC-60772 - Draw order of translucent blocks based on head position (not POV)
修复：半透明方块的渲染顺序取决于头的位置（而不是视野的位置）
MC-63070 - Chunks do not render behind the player in F5. Perhaps culling should calculate from camera POV instead of presuming head position.
修复：F5 下玩家身后的区块不被渲染。剪切可能需要从视野的位置计算，而不是头的位置
MC-71256 - Endermen immediately start moving after being looked at instead of freezing and staring back at you
修复：末影人被盯以后会立刻开始移动，而不是先站着瞪你一会儿
MC-76416 - Player can interact with dying mobs
修复：玩家能够与死亡生物交互
MC-80658 - Note blocks: Gray color for certain music notes
修复：音符盒：某些音符是灰色的
MC-96932 - Minecart and boat shadows are too small
修复：矿车和船的阴影太小了
MC-99255 - Mobs killed by dogs give wrong loot tables
修复：被狗杀死的生物使用了错的战利品表
MC-102514 - Moon has orange light
修复：月亮发橙光
MC-105099 - Slimes & Magma Cubes can still attack players when they are in their death animation
修复：史莱姆和岩浆怪在死亡动画时仍能攻击玩家
MC-109954 - Saddled pigs / horses still move when in their death animation
修复：带着鞍的猪或马在死亡动画时仍在移动
MC-114559 - Lightning converts dying mobs
修复：闪电能够转换正在死的生物
MC-114560 - Dying zombie villager converts to alive villager
修复：正在死的僵尸村民转换为活着的村民
MC-127016 - Waterlogged wooden slabs/stairs/fences/scaffoldings can still catch fire
修复：waterlogged（浸水的）木台阶/楼梯/栅栏/脚手架仍能着火
MC-131845 - Scroll bar resets when selecting a language
修复：选择一个语言后，滚动条恢复原位
MC-132351 - Plants don't grow when there is block above them
修复：当上方有方块时，植物不会生长
MC-133188 - Cannot climb waterlogged ladders or scaffolds
修复：不能爬 waterlogged（浸水的）楼梯或脚手架
MC-135157 - Crops cannot be planted by aiming at the side of a block
修复：农作物不能在看着方块侧面的时候种植
MC-135902 - Dying zombie converts to alive drowned
修复：正在死的僵尸转换为活着的溺尸
MC-137308 - selectWorld.edit.backupFailed has no translation
修复：selectWorld.edit.backupFailed 无翻译
MC-137471 - New wall types are in Building Blocks creative tab instead of Decoration Blocks like the cobblestone walls
修复：新种类的墙在建筑方块类别，而不是像圆石墙那样放在装饰性方块栏。
MC-137476 - Acacia Sign and Jungle Sign have inconsistent positioning in creative tab
修复：金合欢木告示牌和丛林木告示牌在创造模式物品栏中有不一致的位置
MC-137672 - Crossbow Item-Lore does not show information about loaded projectile
修复：弩的下标中不显示加载的弹射物
MC-137725 - Advancements not updated in 1.14 snapshots
修复：1.14 快照中的成就未更新
MC-137810 - Armor stands are not affected by the piercing enchantment
修复：盔甲架不被穿透魔咒影响
MC-137874 - Multishot on crossbow: spread of arrows depends on pitch
修复：弩的多重射击：箭的扩散取决于仰角
MC-137917 - Eating or blocking with crossbow in offhand shows both items
修复：副手拿着弩时吃东西或是隔档会显示两个物品
MC-138071 - Main thread uses 100% of one CPU core when no users are logged in, busy-waiting over java.lang.Thread::yield, makes it hard to profile properly
修复：当没有用户登录时，主线程占用 100% 的单 CPU 核心忙着等待 java.lang.Thread::yield，导致玩家很难登录
MC-138078 - Parrots don't imitate pillagers, ravagers and pandas
修复：鹦鹉不会模仿灾厄村民、灾厄之兽和熊猫
MC-138285 - Unable to break the chorus fruit flower when shooting with an arrow or trident from directly above
修复：不能面向正上方射箭或投掷三叉戟来破坏紫颂花
MC-138699 - Fatal game crash - Polar Bear vehicle NPE
修复：严重的游戏崩溃——北极熊骑着 NPE（NullPointerException）
MC-138766 - Panda, illager beast, turtle, elder guardian and ghast shadow is small compared to other mobs
修复：熊猫、灾厄之兽、海龟、远古守卫者和恶魂的阴影与其他生物相比太小
MC-139559 - Scaffolding blocks do not notify the player when trying to exceed build limit
修复：脚手架方块不会在玩家尝试超过建造限制时提示
MC-139717 - Game hangs while trying to load chunks
修复：加载区块时游戏挂起
MC-140625 - Sweet berry bush cannot replace snow layer, grass, tall grass, fern and large fern unlike other flowers or plants
修复：甜浆果丛不能像其他花或植物那样替换掉雪片、草、高草、蕨类、大型蕨
MC-140651 - Sweet berry bush cannot be planted when aiming at the side or bottom of a block
修复：看着方块侧面或底部时不能放置甜浆果丛
MC-141453 - Patrol leader killed by tamed wolf doesn't give you the bad omen effect
修复：被驯服的狼击杀的巡逻队领队不会给你不祥之兆
MC-142082 - Missing generic inventory types
修复：丢失通用物品栏类型
MC-142583 - Side of wall bell texture is missing when next to certain blocks
修复：在特定方块旁边时，墙上挂的钟的一面材质会丢失
MC-142635 - Clicking bell in spawn protection without op animates bell but plays no sound
修复：在出生点保护区域中，非 op 玩家点击钟会显示动画，但不会有声
MC-142772 - Arrow hitbox change
修复：箭的碰撞箱改变
MC-142890 - Wolves don't attack mobs you damage with a projectile
修复：狼不会攻击用弹射物攻击你的生物
MC-143420 - Wandering Trader and Trader Llama will spawn when game rule doMobSpawning is false
修复：流浪商人和行商羊驼会在 doMobSpawning 游戏规则为 false 时生成
MC-144017 - You can get the "Who's the pillager now?" advancement by killing a pillager with a regular bow
修复：使用普通弓杀死掠夺者也能获得「现在谁才是掠夺者？」进度
MC-144096 - Seventh scaffolding of a scaffolding bridge can not be placed
修复：不能放置脚手架桥的第七个脚手架
MC-144098 - Skin not showing up due to IllegalStateException: Image is not allocated
修复：IllegalStateException: Image is not allocated 导致的不显示皮肤
MC-144175 - Scaffolding placement breaks blocks in its way
修复：放置脚手架会破坏方块
MC-144527 - Difficulty names aren't translated when locking the world difficulty
修复：锁定世界难度以后的难度名未被翻译
MC-144574 - Fire charge can light campfires underwater
修复：烈焰弹可以点燃水下的篝火
MC-144603 - Block entities in player's chunk become stuck when reloading the world
修复：重载世界时，玩家区块中的方块实体卡住
MC-144605 - Minecarts cannot traverse corners
修复：矿车不能横越拐角
MC-144650 - Animals frequently quit following player
修复：动物经常不再跟随玩家
MC-144738 - Tridents go through blocks and appear black
修复：三叉戟穿过方块并变黑
MC-144847 - F3 pie chart spams log with errors
修复：F3 中的饼图被错误刷屏
MC-144928 - Endermen don't try to avoid fireworks
修复：末影人不躲避烟花
MC-145110 - Multishot arrows don't spread when shot from a pillager
修复：掠夺者射出的多重射击箭没有扩散
MC-145111 - When a pillager stops fighting while reloading, it will reload forever until it sees another target
修复：当掠夺者在装弹时停止攻击，他会在下次见到另一个目标以前一直装弹
MC-145118 - Regular bow can use rockets to fire
修复：普通弓能发射火箭
MC-145128 - New note block instrument audible range too low
修复：新的音符盒乐器能听到的范围太低了
MC-145411 - Skeleton bows don't use enchantments
修复：骷髅的弓没有附魔
MC-145498 - Dogs attack tamed cats
修复：狗攻击驯服的猫
MC-144784 - Entities are invisible when joining/teleporting to areas outside spawn chunks
修复：进入/传送入出生点区块以外的实体会不显示
